stalin ha trotski athara gatuma, hudu pudgalayin dedeneku athara pudgala balaya matha athi wu aathmiya kakotaganimak bawata kerena pa්rakasha tharam aithihasikawa abhutha ha deshapalanikawa adahiya nohaki deyak aththe natha. 1920 gananwala sowiyat komiyunist pakshaya thula pana nagunu aragalaya, trotski wisin mehewana lada wama wiparshawaye samajawadi jathyantharawadayata erehiwa, stalin wisin meheyawana lada sowiyat niladharaye jathikawadi wyaja samajawadaya yana, samahan nokala haki ekinekata pa්rathiwiruddha ki්rayamargayan athara gatumak wiya.
